Html:
Is the accordion control broken when using it in Expression Blend 3?

When I add the control I instantly get the following error..

"The element "[AccordionItem]" could not be displayed because of a problem with System.Controls.AccordionItem

Object not sent to and instance of an object.

I am new to EB so it could be me, but my initial guess is that the control is broken in the toolkit.

 

Drew
